Package presentation.block

Class ActionBlockPresentation

java.lang.Object
presentation.block.PresentationBlock<ActionBlock>
presentation.block.ActionBlockPresentation
public class ActionBlockPresentation
extends PresentationBlock<ActionBlock>
Class responsible to handle the visuals and block UI interactions from the ActionBlock.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
